original_text: For whatsoever things were written aforetime were written for our learning, that we through patience and comfort of the scriptures might have hope.
korean_text: 무엇이든지 전에 기록된 바는 우리의 교훈을 위하여 기록된 것이니 우리로 하여금 인내로 또는 성경의 위로로 소망을 가지게 함이니라

sentences.original_text: For whatsoever things were written aforetime
that we through patience and comfort of the scriptures
